original_text: So it was annulled on that day, and the sheep traders, who were watching me, knew that it was the word of the Lord.
korean_text: 당일에 곧 폐하매 내 말을 지키던 가련한 양들은 이것이 여호와의 말씀이었던 줄 안지라

sentences.original_text: So it was annulled on that day
and the sheep traders, who were watching me,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나를 지켜보고 있던 양 떼 상인들은

sentences.original_text: knew that it was the word of the Lord.
